mapper.select: select product_detail_info, product.product_idx, product.product_name, product.product_coloroption, product_price from cart, product where cart.product_idx = product.product_idx and member_id = 'dummy20'
mapper.insert: insert into order_form (order_idx, product_idx, member_id, order_date) values (order_seq.nextval, #{product_idx}, #{member_id}, sysdate)

insert into order_detail (order_idx, product_idx, order_name, order_receiver_name, order_receiver_phonenumber, order_receiver_address, order_quantity, payment_method, order_date) values (#{order_idx}, #{product_idx}, #{order_name}, #{order_receiver_name}, #{order_receiver_phonenumber}, #{order_receiver_address}, #{order_quantity}, #{payment_method}, to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select * from ORDER_DETAIL where order_idx = (select max(order_idx) from order_form)
